document_data.name: ''Staff of a Mumbling Wizard''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''staff of a mumbling wizard''''' an [[enchantment]] [[staff]] of dubious magics.
document_data.Powers: The ''staff of a mumbling wizard'' possessed an unreliable enchantment that allowed the wilder to cast the ''[[fireball]]'' or the ''[[firebolt]]'' [[spells]] at random. The random casting was the result of the [[staff]] being a creation of a compulsively mumbling [[mage]] whose words made it impossible for the weapon to differentiate between the two command words.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the ''staff of a mumbling wizard'' was displayed among splendorous enchanted rewards for those willing to partake in [[Akabi]]'s Wheel of Fortune game in the [[Circus of the Last Days]] during its stay in the [[Baldur's Gate/Rivington|Rivington]] neighborhood of [[Baldur's Gate]].
